column1: The Pit Room////Worth the hype. Best barbeque that I've had in Houston. The potato salad is divine. The sliced brisket is thick and flavorful. I had my items to go and they held up well during the drive home. Service is speedy and kind. The line gets long and the inside can get crowded
column2: but nothing too bad. If an introvert like me
column4: can handle it - anyone can. Highly recommend!!!
